maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Sorry, we're really busy trying to handle stuff right now.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Désolé, mais on est vraiment occupé à gérer tout ça.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.note: de: mais là on a vraiment tout à faire.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Why?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Well... if you want to help, talk to \c[3]PuellaDocta\c[0] at the \c[3]entrance of Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bon... si tu veux aider, parle à \c[3]PuellaDocta\c[0] à \c[3]l'entrée de la \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: She's tasked with recruiting, it'll make my life a lot easier if you go through her.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Elle est chargée du recrutement. Si tu la rencontres, ça m'économisera une tonne de travail.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Wervyn
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Wervyn

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Good luck in Sapphire Ridge!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bonne chance à la \v[area.forest.name] !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I'm certain there will be plenty of players in need of rescuing, considering the fierce opponents that roam the area.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Je suis certain qu'il y aura plein de joueurs à sauver, vu les adversaires féroces qui trainent là-bas.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: PuellaDocta

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Ah, there she is!\. Hiii!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Ah, là voilà !\. Saluuut !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: You must be Lea.\. Nice to meet you!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Tu dois être Lea.\. Ravi de te rencontrer !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I'm Wervyn, I run things around here.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Je suis Wervyn ! Je fais tourner les choses ici.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Wervyn
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Wervyn

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And how about you?\. What attracted you to our quest posting?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et sinon, toi ?\. Qu'est-ce qui t'as attiré vers notre petite annonce de quête ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Not very talkative...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pas très causante...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Maybe not, but she was very enthusiastic about helping us.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Peut-être pas, mais elle était très enthousiaste pour nous aider.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Your speech module's busted, isn't it.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Ton module vocal est foutu, c'est ça ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Thought so, I've seen that a couple of times before.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est bien ce que je pensais. Ça arrive souvent, à ce qui paraît.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Don't worry about it, you won't need to do any talking for this.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Mais c'est pas grave, pas besoin de parler pour ça.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: But anyway. Have you heard the \c[3]tales of the Last Minute Heroes\c[0]?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Mais sinon, tu as déjà entendu parler de la \c[3]légende des Héros de la Dernière Minute\c[0] ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Wervyn
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Wervyn

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Whenever a lone Seeker is stuck in a dire situation...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: À chaque fois qu'un \v[lore.title.seeker] se retrouve dans une situation désespérée...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.note: de: est coincé dans une enclume

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: When a decisive battle goes out of hand...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Quand une bataille décisive deviens hors de contrôle...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Just when all hope seems lost...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Quand tout espoir semble perdu...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: That's when we arrive!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est là qu'on arrive !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: The cavalry of CrossWorlds!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: La cavalerie de CrossWorlds !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: PuellaDocta

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: The ultimate deus ex machina!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Le deus ex machina ultime !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Saving the day...\. at the very last minute!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: En sauvant la mise...\. à la dernière minute !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Yes, that's what we do.\. Saving players in need.\. At the last minute.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et oui, c'est ce qu'on fait ici.\. On sauve les joueurs en détresse.\. À la dernière minute.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: That part's very important!\. That's our niche!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Cette partie est très importante !\. C'est notre niche !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And we do it everywhere in the Playground at all times.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et on est partout sur le Terrain de Jeu, à chaque instant.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Except on holidays, of course!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Sauf bien sûr pendant les vacances !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Right. Anyway, finding players in need and arriving just in time isn't actually that easy.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oui. En tout cas, ce n'est pas toujours facile de trouver des joueurs en détresse et d'arriver juste à temps.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: That's why we employ the \c[3]LMRS\c[0] - our amazing "\c[3]Last Minute Rescue System\c[0]"!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est là que le \c[3]SSDM\c[0] entre en jeu - notre magnifique "\c[3]Système de Secours de la Dernière Minute\c[0]" !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: He likes to make it sound super impressive...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Il aime bien rendre ça super incroyable...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: But really it's just guild members on the lookout in literally every corner of the Playground.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Mais en fait, c'est juste des membres qui se trouvent dans chaque coin du Terrain de Jeu.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Well that...\. and our highly advanced communication system.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bon, ça, et...\. notre système de communication hautement sophistiqué.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: That's right! We have access to some...\. additional information.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est vrai ! On a accès à...\. des informations supplémentaires.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And we use it to D-Link nearby guild members, telling them where to do the rescuing!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et on l'utilise pour faire des D-Links aux membres pour leur dire où ça chauffe !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Exactly.\. And with both of these things combined, the LMRS works flawlessly.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Parfaitement.\. Et avec ces deux choses combinées, le SSDM fonctionne parfaitement.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: ... given we have enough guild members to help us.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: ... tant que l'on a assez de membres pour nous aider.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Unfortunately, we're currently short-handed.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Malheureusement on est un peu à court en ce moment.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Yeah, everybody's distracted now that the new "Laser Bridge Builder" has just been released.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oui, depuis que le nouveau "Simulateur de Pont Laser" est sorti, tout le monde est parti.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Whoa?! It has?!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Quoi ?! Il est sorti ?!

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I...\. I gotta go for a second!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Je...\. Je dois y aller !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Logout
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Déconnexion

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Wervyn
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Wervyn

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Anyway, that's where you come in, Lea.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: En tout cas... c'est là où tu entres en jeu, Lea.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: We currently need more players on the lookout in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: On a actuellement besoin de plus de joueurs à l'affut à la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: PuellaDocta

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And don't worry, we won't ask you to stay put for the whole day or anything!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et ne t'inquiète pas, on ne va pas te demander d'attendre la journée entière non plus.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.note: de: something like ne pas bouger de ta chaise ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Yes, obviously. Any amount of contribution is appreciated.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oui, en tout cas, chaque contribution est la bienvenue.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: To start things off, just head back to the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] and wait around the landmark!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pour démarrer, reviens vers l'\c[3]Auberge des Caves\c[0] à la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0] et poste-toi près du point de téléportation !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I'll give you remote support and tell you via D-Link if there's anyone in need of rescuing!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Je vais rester ici pour faire le support à distance et je te dirais via D-Link lorsque quelqu'un a besoin d'aide !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Lea!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Lea !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Uhm...\. Puella! Yay!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Heu...\. Puella ! Super !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Thanks for helping us out, Lea.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Merci pour ton aide, Lea.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Non...\. too expensive.\. I'll wait for a sale.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Non...\. Trop cher.\. Je vais attendre qu'il soit en solde.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Man, I'm having a hard time with those dungeons in the Jungle.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Eh ben, j'ai vraiment du mal avec les donjons dans la jungle.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oh yeah... those can be quite tricky.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Ah oui, ils peuvent être assez compliqués.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Those puzzles just make my head steam!\. And I haven't even reached that huge tree yet.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Ces puzzles me font mal à la tête !\. Et je n'ai même pas encore atteint le grand arbre.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: If you don't want to be bothered with the puzzles, maybe just have a look at Wervyn's guides!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Si tu n'as pas de chance avec les puzzles, tu devrais aller voir les guides de Wervyn !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Wait...\. our guild leader wrote guides for CrossWorlds?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Attends...\. notre chef de guilde a écrit des guides pour CrossWorlds ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Yes!\. In fact he was among the first to release guides shortly after the game was released!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oui !\. En fait il était l'un des premiers à l'avoir fait depuis que le jeu est sorti.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: That's good to know!\. I might have a look, then.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est bon à savoir !\. J'irai peut-être jeter un coup d'œil.
... Salut !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oi!\. If you don't mind, I'm just chillin' here and enjoying the view of those palm trees.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Yo !\. Je suis en train de me reposer un peu et d'admirer ces palmiers.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Palm trees are so pretty.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Les palmiers, c'est si joli.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: That's why I love being in \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0], place's filled with palm trees.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est pour ça que j'adore être à \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0], l'endroit est rempli de palmiers.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Feels like spending a vacation at a resort!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: On se croirait en vacances !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Why are you running?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu coures comme ça ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Training!!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Je m'entraine !!

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Why in this room though?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et pourquoi tu fais ça ici ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Moving fast in narrow space!!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pour me déplacer rapidement dans les zones étroites !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: But what if people want to train here?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et si les gens veulent s'entraîner ici ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Do you?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Tu veux t'entraîner ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: No, but...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Non, mais...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: So it's empty, no problem!!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Donc c'est libre, je peux continuer !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Do we have enough members stationed in Gaia's Garden?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Est-ce qu'on a assez de membres postés dans le \v[area.jungle.name] ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Eh, just barely. We could definitely use more, that place is huge!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Euh, juste assez. Ce serait bien d'en avoir plus, cet endroit est énorme !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: True.\. What about Autumn's Rise?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est vrai.\. Et pour \v[area.autumn-area.name] ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Just Mosapang and Elikenz.\. Everyone else said they felt too overleveled for it!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Juste Mosapang et Elikenz.\. tous les autres disent qu'ils ont un niveau trop élevé pour ça !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Well someone has to do it.\. There's rescuing to be done in Autumn's Rise as well!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bah, il faut bien que quelqu'un le fasse.\. Il y a aussi des gens à secourir à \v[area.autumn-area.name] !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: PuellaDocta

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Wervyn
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Wervyn

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hey you!\. How's it going?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Hé !\. Comment ça va ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hello Lea.\. It's good to see you again.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bonjour Lea.\. C'est bon de te revoir.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Fortunately things are a lot better now that most guild members have returned.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Heureusement les choses se sont arrangées depuis, le gros des membres de la guilde sont revenus.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I guess they ran out of laser bridges to build!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: J'imagine qu'ils n'avaient plus de pont laser à construire !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Which is good, because there will always be players in need of saving!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est bon pour nous, parce que des joueurs en détresse, il y en aura toujours !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hang on...\. Apollo?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Attends...\. Apollo ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Is that you, playing ANOTHER alt?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est toi ? Tu joues ENCORE un nouveau personnage ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oh my gosh, you're right!\. Haha!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oh mon dieu, tu as raison !\. Haha !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Yes, you discovered me.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bon, vous avez gagné.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: How can you tell?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Comment vous m'avez reconnu ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Something about the way you carry yourself.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Quelque chose sur la manière dont tu te tiens.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: You can change your appearance but every time you're just trying so hard to stand out.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Tu peux changer ton apparence, mais à chaque fois tu cherches toujours à pavaner.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Plus, you always go with green hair...\. and you always use the same name.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: De plus, tu prends toujours des cheveux verts...\. Et tu utilises toujours le même nom.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And you're always a Spheromancer.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et tu joues toujours un Spheromancer.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: You know, most players would have at least tried out another class by now.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Tu sais, les autres joueurs auraient au moins essayé une autre classe entre-temps.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Why would I ever choose anything but the most honorable class of the game!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pourquoi j'irais choisir autre chose que la classe la plus glorieuse du jeu ?!

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Apollo will always be a Spheromancer!!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Apollo sera toujours un Spheromancer !!

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Did he tell you he used to be a member of our guild?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Il t'a pas dit qu'avant il était un membre de notre guilde ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Well, seems appropiate.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Ouais, ça collerait.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: First time I hear about it.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est la première fois que j'en entends parler.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oh, so this is the guild you told me about, Polly.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oh, donc c'est la guilde dont tu me parlais, Polly.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Heehee!\. Makes sense for such a justice-obsessed guy, right?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Heehee !\. C'est logique pour un type aussi obsédé par la justice, non ?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.note: de : pour un fanatique de la justice

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Alas, you just never appreciated my sense of style!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Hélas, vous n'avez jamais apprécié mon sens du style !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: What he means is he could never get the timing down.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Ce qu'il veut dire, c'est qu'il n'a jamais tenus les délais.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Always took too long preparing his big entrances.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Il lui fallait toujours autant de temps pour préparer ses apparitions grandioses.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Alright, enough of this conversation!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oui bon, ça suffit maintenant !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Aw, no hard feelings!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oooh, sans rancune !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Why?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hm?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Hm ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oh! Are you wondering if the players actually \c[3]need\c[0] saving?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oh ! Tu veux savoir si les joueurs ont vraiment \c[3]besoin\c[0] d'être sauvés ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Hmm, interesting point she's got there, Werv.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Hmm, bonne question, Werv ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Why...\. it's always a noble thing to do, isn't it?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Pourquoi...\. c'est toujours quelque chose de noble à faire, non ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I mean...\. if you die in battle, you just respawn and try again, so...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Je veux dire...\. si tu meurs au combat, tu réapparais et tu peux réessayer, donc...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Well...
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bon...

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And some people actually think our rescues are glorified kill-stealing!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et certains pensent que nos sauvetages ne sont que des vols de kills déguisé !
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.note: this is the expression that i see the most among cringy french streamers (which is already a pleonasm)

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oh, come on!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oh, aller !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: We don't even get any loot or EXP, the game system doesn't work like that.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: On récupère même pas de butin ou d'EXP, la mécanique de jeu ne fonctionne pas comme ça.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Right, it's absurd.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oui, c'est absurde.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: But maaaaybe some players actually want the challenge?
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Mais peut-être que certains joueurs VEULENT du challenge ?

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Okay, fair enough.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Bon OK, t'as gagné.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: It's just great fun to play the heroes.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: C'est juste marrant de jouer au héros.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: And people are usually happy about it.\. Most of the time.
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Et les gens sont habituellement contents de ça.\. La plupart du temps.

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: Oh, I'm totally with you!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Oh, pour ça tu as raison !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: I wish our guild was around when I was starting out, I needed the help and wanted to help other noobs!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Si seulement notre guilde existait lorsque je débutais dans le jeu. J'aurais bien eu besoin d'aide et j'aurais bien aidé les autres !

maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.orig: But...\. playing a little devil's advocate is always fun!
maps/autumn/guild/lmh-inner-og.json/enti.text: Mais...\. jouer les avocats du diable c'est toujours marrant !
